players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Bob: "Looks like Diana was targeted last night, which is pretty suspicious. I think we need to carefully watch who’s pushing accusations too hard; could be the detective trying to protect themselves."
You: "Bob is mafia. We need to vote him out now before he kills again."
Bob: "Accusing me so quickly without evidence seems reckless, Alice. Maybe the real detective is trying to mislead us by pointing fingers prematurely."
You: "Bob is the only mafia here, and delaying his arrest only puts us in more danger. Charlie, we need your vote to stop him before he strikes again."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
